messages.subject: Re: wildlife field guide photos
messages.msgSnippet: ... site) for ... resources ... I heard a woman today, while at the kids gymnastics, talking about how she always chooses books for her children over the
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Karin" <curtkar@c...> wrote:
> Wow! What a great site!
> The kids and I have been listening to the local bird calls (at the
site) for
> the past 1/2 hour.
> I'll definitely put this in my favorites. :-) I am amazed at the
resources
> available to us, at our fingertips.
> Thanks for sharing this website.
>
> Karin


I heard a woman today, while at the kids gymnastics, talking about
how she always chooses books for her children over the computer to
learn about things. She liked to do things the old fashion way, and
had strong beliefs about the value of book learning. I kept my mouth
shut because I was just sitting there and not really involved in the
conversation, but I couldn't believe the attitude. All of the
wonderful computer programs and internet information we have at our
finger tips. I am still in awe of it. I can't imagine limiting it
or looking down upon it.
Joanna

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] wildlife field guide photos
messages.msgSnippet: Wow! What a great site! The kids and I have been listening to the local bird calls (at the site) for the past 1/2 hour. I ll definitely put this in my
messages.messageBody:
Wow! What a great site!
The kids and I have been listening to the local bird calls (at the site) for
the past 1/2 hour.
I'll definitely put this in my favorites. :-) I am amazed at the resources
available to us, at our fingertips.
Thanks for sharing this website.

Karin




> <A
HREF="http://www.enature.com/guides/select_group.asp">http://www.enature.com
/guides/select_group.asp</A>
>
> Very cool website - you put in your zipcode and get field guide photos of
> wildlife in your area.
>
> --pamS

<A HREF="http://www.enature.com/guides/select_group.asp">http://www.enature.com/guides/select_group.asp</A>
